title: Down and out in the Magic Kingdom
creator: Doctorow, Cory
description: From craphound.com: My first novel was published in January 2003. It concerns the machinations of technologically immportals who have occupied Walt Disney World's Haunted Mansion and who aim to preserve it from the depredations of modernizers who would renovate it. The book won the 2003 Locus Award for Best First Novel and is a finalist for the 2004 Nebula for Best Novel.

Realizing his boyhood dream of moving to the twentieth-century artistic creation of Disney World, Jules becomes incensed by a new group that would change the Hall of Presidents by replacing the audioanimatronics with brain interfaces
